actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Water Resources.

official_title: A bill to restrict the Army Corps of Engineers' authority to increase releases from the headwaters reservoirs of the Upper Mississippi River.
short_title: Upper Mississippi Headwaters Protection Act of 1988

summary.text: Upper Mississippi Headwaters Protection Act of 1988 - Prohibits the Secretary of the Army from substantially increasing a release from any of the headwaters reservoirs in the Upper Mississippi River region in Minnesota unless the Secretary first transmits to specified congressional committees a report justifying such increase.

titles.title: Upper Mississippi Headwaters Protection Act of 1988
A bill to restrict the Army Corps of Engineers' authority to increase releases from the headwaters reservoirs of the Upper Mississippi River.
